00043 bool TestSource::next(ByteString &key, ByteString &value) {
00044   String line;
00045   boost::shared_array<char> line_ptr;
00046   char *base, *ptr, *last;
00047   char *rowkey;
00048   char *column;
00049   char *value_str;
00050   uint64_t timestamp;
00051 
00052   while (getline(m_fin, line)) {
00053     m_cur_line++;
00054 
00055     boost::trim(line);
00056 
00057     line_ptr.reset(new char [strlen(line.c_str()) + 1]);
00058     base = line_ptr.get();
00059     strcpy(base, line.c_str());
00060 
00061     if ((ptr = strtok_r(base, "\t", &last)) == 0) {
00062       cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00063       continue;
00064     }
00065 
00066     if (!strcasecmp(ptr, "AUTO")) {
00067       timestamp = 0;
00068     }
00069     else {
00070       timestamp = strtoll(ptr, 0, 0);
00071       if (timestamp == 0 && errno == EINVAL) {
00072         cerr << "Invalid timestamp (" << ptr << ") on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00073         continue;
00074       }
00075       if (m_min_timestamp == 0 || timestamp < m_min_timestamp)
00076         m_min_timestamp = timestamp;
00077     }
00078 
00079     if ((rowkey = strtok_r(0, "\t", &last)) == 0) {
00080       cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00081       continue;
00082     }
00083 
00087     size_t row_key_len = strlen(rowkey);
00088     if (row_key_len >= 2) {
00089       if (!strcmp(&rowkey[row_key_len-2], "??")) {
00090         rowkey[row_key_len-1] = (char)0xff;
00091         rowkey[row_key_len-2] = (char)0xff;
00092       }
00093     }
00094 
00095     if ((column = strtok_r(0, "\t", &last)) == 0) {
00096       cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00097       continue;
00098     }
00099 
00100     if (!strcmp(column, "DELETE")) {
00101       if (!create_row_delete(rowkey, timestamp, key, value)) {
00102         cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00103         continue;
00104       }
00105       return true;
00106     }
00107 
00108     if ((value_str = strtok_r(0, "\t", &last)) == 0)
00109       value_str = "";
00110 
00111     if (!strcmp(value_str, "DELETE")) {
00112       if (!create_column_delete(rowkey, column, timestamp, key, value)) {
00113         cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00114         continue;
00115       }
00116       return true;
00117     }
00118 
00119     row_key_len = strlen(value_str);
00120     if (row_key_len >= 2) {
00121       if (!strcmp(&value_str[row_key_len-2], "??")) {
00122         value_str[row_key_len-1] = (char)0xff;
00123         value_str[row_key_len-2] = (char)0xff;
00124         cerr << "converting end of value (" << value_str << ")" << endl;
00125       }
00126     }
00127 
00128     if (!create_insert(rowkey, column, timestamp, value_str, key, value)) {
00129       cerr << "Mal-formed input on line " << (m_cur_line-1) << endl;
00130       continue;
00131     }
00132 
00133     return true;
00134   }
00135 
00136   return false;
00137 }

00140 bool TestSource::create_row_delete(const char *row, uint64_t timestamp, ByteString &key, ByteString &value) {
00141   int32_t keylen = strlen(row) + 12;
00142 
00143   m_key_buffer.clear();
00144   m_key_buffer.ensure(sizeof(int32_t)+keylen);
00145 
00146   Serialization::encode_vi32(&m_key_buffer.ptr, keylen);
00147   m_key_buffer.add_unchecked(row, strlen(row)+1);
00148   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = 0;
00149   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = 0;
00150   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = FLAG_DELETE_ROW;
00151   Key::encode_ts64(&m_key_buffer.ptr, timestamp);
00152 
00153   key.ptr = m_key_buffer.base;
00154 
00155   m_value_buffer.clear();
00156   append_as_byte_string(m_value_buffer, 0, 0);
00157   value.ptr = m_value_buffer.base;
00158   return true;
00159 }

00162 bool TestSource::create_column_delete(const char *row, const char *column, uint64_t timestamp, ByteString &key, ByteString &value) {
00163   int32_t keylen = 0;
00164   string cfstr;
00165   const char *qualifier;
00166   const char *ptr = strchr(column, ':');
00167 
00168   if (ptr == 0) {
00169     cerr << "Bad column family specifier (no family)" << endl;
00170     return false;
00171   }
00172 
00173   cfstr = string(column, ptr-column);
00174   qualifier = ptr+1;
00175 
00176   Schema::ColumnFamily *cf = m_schema->get_column_family(cfstr);
00177   if (cf == 0) {
00178     cerr << "Column family '" << cfstr << "' not found in schema" << endl;
00179     return false;
00180   }
00181 
00182   m_key_buffer.clear();
00183   keylen = strlen(row) + strlen(qualifier) + 12;
00184   m_key_buffer.ensure(sizeof(int32_t)+keylen);
00185 
00186   Serialization::encode_vi32(&m_key_buffer.ptr, keylen);
00187   m_key_buffer.add_unchecked(row, strlen(row)+1);
00188   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = cf->id;
00189   m_key_buffer.add_unchecked(qualifier, strlen(qualifier)+1);
00190   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = FLAG_DELETE_CELL;
00191   Key::encode_ts64(&m_key_buffer.ptr, timestamp);
00192 
00193   key.ptr = m_key_buffer.base;
00194 
00195   m_value_buffer.clear();
00196   append_as_byte_string(m_value_buffer, 0, 0);
00197   value.ptr = m_value_buffer.base;
00198   return true;
00199 }

00202 bool TestSource::create_insert(const char *row, const char *column, uint64_t timestamp, const char *value_str, ByteString &key, ByteString &value) {
00203   int32_t keylen = 0;
00204   string cfstr;
00205   const char *qualifier;
00206   const char *ptr = strchr(column, ':');
00207 
00208   if (ptr == 0) {
00209     cerr << "Bad column family specifier (no family)" << endl;
00210     return false;
00211   }
00212 
00213   cfstr = string(column, ptr-column);
00214   qualifier = ptr+1;
00215 
00216   Schema::ColumnFamily *cf = m_schema->get_column_family(cfstr);
00217   if (cf == 0) {
00218     cerr << "Column family '" << cfstr << "' not found in schema" << endl;
00219     return false;
00220   }
00221 
00222   m_key_buffer.clear();
00223   keylen = strlen(row) + strlen(qualifier) + 12;
00224   m_key_buffer.ensure(keylen+sizeof(int32_t));
00225 
00226   Serialization::encode_vi32(&m_key_buffer.ptr, keylen);
00227   m_key_buffer.add_unchecked(row, strlen(row)+1);
00228   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = cf->id;
00229   m_key_buffer.add_unchecked(qualifier, strlen(qualifier)+1);
00230   *m_key_buffer.ptr++ = FLAG_INSERT;
00231   Key::encode_ts64(&m_key_buffer.ptr, timestamp);
00232 
00233   key.ptr = m_key_buffer.base;
00234 
00235   m_value_buffer.clear();
00236   append_as_byte_string(m_value_buffer, value_str, strlen(value_str));
00237   value.ptr = m_value_buffer.base;
00238   return true;
00239 }
